Author: sharpay
Title: ‚ú¥Ô∏è SHARPAY ‚ú¥Ô∏è Share button with blockchain rewards ‚úÖ Buy Now! ‚úÖ
Body: Dear Sharpay Community Members!  Sharpay development update: Created a script to merge accounts with the same email & social networks, fixed database social network bindings, improved Telegram account binding, speeded up sharing window, added tools for system admin and improved alert UI.  Despite spending most of the time working on one of the main feature that we are going to release, we improved our Sharpay buttons and added some tools. Here are some of the development tasks we have done:  1) Created a script for merging accounts with the same email & social networks. We found that some users owned multiple accounts with the same social networks or emails that they accidentally created during registration using social networks. It was inconvenient and impossible to manage accounts for users. In order to detect and control duplicated accounts, we created a script for our system admin to automatically or manually merge accounts. This could also check each user account and accessibility and manage user accounts (to merge or duplicate account if necessary).  During this task, we discovered 59 inaccessible accounts that had neither password & email logins nor social network account bindings. These empty user accounts have been deleted by our system. There were 60 duplicated accounts, and our system have merged them accordingly. We have also sent emails to all the merged account users and notified them about the account changes.   With this new script and improvement, our system admin can check and monitor user accounts more easily and efficiently. It will also automatically send email notifications to users for any account changes.  2) Fixed database social network bindings. If the social network user is going to link to his Sharpay account has already used by another user, it will not work and will show user an error message. It can prevent user from creating multiple accounts using the same social networks.  We spent quite a lot of time to fix this social network bindings and it took us more time than what we expected. It was because we needed to test all 15 different social networks, and for each one we tested and corrected errors. Also, for linking social networks, it is tightly integrated with third-party authentication services that work only with our app.sharpay.io domain.   3) Created merging account tool for system admin. We created a tool for our system admin to detect and merge accounts with identical social network bindings. Before we needed to manual check and merge identical accounts which took us a lot of time.   4) Improved Telegram account binding. We improved the user identity field in our database and made sure it would be filled with a unique identifier when creating the Telegram account binding.   5) Speeded up the loading of the sharing window. We made asynchronous pull-up of metadata from the site to the sharing window in order to speed up the loading and improve performance.   6) Created passage mark for KYC in admin system. Now our admin will show a passage mark of KYC for those users who have passed the KYC for withdrawing their tokens bought in Token Sale.   7) Added a close button to alert messages. We have improved the UI with Bootstrap, users are now able to dismiss the alert messages manually by themselves.  Time is ticking and we are getting ready for the next new upgrade. Stay with us and wait for our news!  In Sharing We Trust! Sharpay.io Team

Author: sharpay
Title: ‚ú¥Ô∏è SHARPAY ‚ú¥Ô∏è Share button with blockchain rewards ‚úÖ Buy Now! ‚úÖ
Body: Dear Sharpay Community Members!  We have made an important strategic decision to focus on developing our sharing with blockchain rewards feature only. Now, this is our main feature.  Our Sharpay buttons have 2 main features: multisharing and sharing with blockchain rewards, and we have always promoted them together before. Each of them is unique in itself.  When we started developing our multisharing button, we aimed to connect all top social networks around the world, so everyone can share website content to their favourite social networks in one click (multisharing feature). However, some of the largest world social networks and messengers, such as WeChat and Kakao never give anyone the opportunity to use their social networks for multisharing. We did countless requests, but they were ineffectual. That is because of their company policies. As WeChat and Kakao are the largest social networks in Asia, multisharing has never been full-fledged without them.  Not so long ago, Facebook also restricted the rights of developers. This is due to last year's Facebook database leak scandal, for which Mark Zuckerberg was justified in the US Congress. The restriction applies to all applications. Because of that, now our users cannot use the multisharing feature for sharing news to Facebook unfortunately.  As Facebook is the largest social network, we believe that this restriction is very essential for us. This finally clarified the situation, now it became clear that our first feature ‚Äî multisharing in one click ‚Äî without Facebook can no longer be equivalent to our second main feature ‚Äî sharing with blockchain rewards. That is why we now decided to focus on the development and promotion of the Sharpay sharing with blockchain rewards feature as our only one major and unique feature.  However, it does not mean that we will give up and stop development or supporting our multishare feature! We only shift our development priority. Now multisharing on some large social networks is not possible yet, but periodically we will send them requests on using their API with advanced features. As soon as they approve our requests, we will definitely release it!  Now about the main thing.  Our sharing with blockchain rewards feature is automatic, unique and has no analogues. The use of this feature cannot be technically limited, therefore now we are not dependent on the policies of any social networks. And we have an international PCT patent priority on 152 countries for this (by the way, we will soon tell you in detail what it means).  Currently in accordance with our strategic vision, we are developing a new sharing window. As soon as the user decides to share interesting content from any site using our Sharpay share buttons, he will see a new sharing window with more technological features. The new sharing window will provide users all these three different methods for choosing:  - direct sharing with rewards - multisharing with rewards - referral link for sharing with rewards.  As the connected social networks in direct sharing and multisharing are different, all social networks in both sharing methods are different too. Unlike the old sharing window of which websites can only install one sharing option, either multisharing or direct sharing buttons, the new Sharpay sharing window will give users freedom and autonomous to choose different sharing methods.  We believe that with the usual clear-to-everyone sharing with unique features and focusing on sharing with rewards, Sharpay will succeed. Especially considering the fact that now you can do sharing with rewards on Facebook, WeChat, Kakao and all main social networks! It is very cool!  Now we are finishing work on updating our UI / UX and will soon make the official release of our new sharing window, user accounts, and also update our site, in accordance with the 2019‚Äô UI / UX trends.  Thank you for your faith and support! Are you ready for "to the moon" with Sharpay?  In Sharing We Trust! Sharpay.io Team

Author: sharpay
Title: ‚ú¥Ô∏è SHARPAY ‚ú¥Ô∏è Share button with blockchain rewards ‚úÖ Buy Now! ‚úÖ
Body: Dear Friends!   Sharpay development update: added Facebook Messenger to direct sharing, strengthened comment section‚Äôs validation in sharing window, improved share bonus calculation, fixed network region table, fixed floating widget display bug and etc.  We have been intensively developing our new features and improving our Sharpay share buttons. We have finished a lot of tasks, such as:  1) Added Facebook Messenger to direct sharing. Users are now able to share website content to Facebook Messenger. Sharing on Facebook Messenger is working on both desktop and mobile (iOS and Android) apps. The Facebook Messenger API works differently in desktop and mobile devices, so we need to work separately for that.  We need to detect user‚Äôs device first and then call different APIs accordingly. We expanded the networks table in our database, added different call function for the API and changed the redirection links.  Currently, it is available only on direct sharing, but once the API supports also our multisharing function, we will definitely develop and add it to our multisharing buttons.  2) Strengthened comment section‚Äôs validation in sharing window. In the comment section of sharing window, we improved the comment validation and security. When we were working on the validation, we also found out that if user wanted to share content with comment on LINE or Reddit, the comment could not be empty. We needed to consider different situation and sharing limitation on different social networks, and added different validation rules accordingly.  We have added length and content validation in the comment section in both front end and back end sides of our application. Now, users cannot write any URLs in the comment section, also in certain social networks, the users cannot share website content without leaving any comments. Otherwise, an error message will display to remind user.  3) Improved share bonus calculation. Every time users share website content on their social networks, our system will check and calculate the share bonus to prevent cheating on sharing. We have improved the script by taking out the ‚Äúhour counter‚Äù component and adding the user‚Äôs active multishare list checking.  4) Fixed network region table. When we were working on the Facebook Messenger sharing function, we found that the network region table in our database had several errors and omissions. We therefore wrote a script to fix it.  5) Fixed floating widget display bug. When the mouse move around the floating widget, it did not display the background specified in the SVG image before. We have fixed the bug and updated the background colour. Now, the floating widget is working normally.   6) Fixed notification email for merging account. We found out that when we merged two identical accounts, the system would send notification email per account. We have therefore fixed it and now our system will check the duplicate email addresses and send only one notification email per email.   7) Fixed the sharing counter error caused by the change of encoding. We have corrected the error in the operation of the sharing counter due to the change of encoding.   8 ) Enabled user‚Äôs notification language. We added language option in the notification script. If user choose his language option, all notification messages will change in his language automatically.  We will continuously announce our development news to our social networks! If you have any problems using our Sharpay buttons, please do not hesitate to contact our admin (https://t.me/sharpay_admin).    In Sharing We Trust! Sharpay.io Team

Title: ‚ú¥Ô∏è SHARPAY ‚ú¥Ô∏è Share button with blockchain rewards ‚úÖ Buy Now! ‚úÖ
Body: Dear Friends!  We have combined sale.sharpay.io accounts and app.sharpay.io accounts for system optimization.  We are pleased to announced that the sale.sharpay.io and app.sharpay.io accounts have been combined together. We have merged all the duplicate accounts, and transferred all unique accounts from sale.sharpay.io with the balance of S tokens purchased in Token Sale that have not withdrawn, to app.sharpay.io.  Many of our community members had to have two separate accounts in our systems. Before, sale cabinet (sale.sharpay.io) was necessary for us at the Token Sale stage, but now it is only used for token distribution and KYC procedures. The token withdrawal function is already available in our main system (app.sharpay.io), but there was no mechanism for KYC. Therefore, we decided to integrate KYC system from our partner Sum & Substance (S&S) into app.sharpay.io system, and simplify it for our users.  We work with S&S directly for the KYC and integration. We have requested a developer key to access the documentation and test the API. The documentation describes in detail several integration methods and we are able to choose the appropriate method for our system. S&S is very responsive to the work of their system, it has checked and tested the KYC system, and made sure that everything was properly configured before the release of KYC procedure on our app.sharpay.io.  To make sure that Token Sale buyers from sale.sharpay.io can successfully login on app.sharpay.io, we have changed the login form on sale.sharpay.io. When you try to log in on sale.sharpay.io, we will inform you about the combine of accounts and send you an instruction email to login on app.sharpay.io. In addition, we will ask you to update your password and two-factor authentication settings for your account security.  Now, we have transferred all your tokens from sale.sharpay.io that you have purchased in our Token Sale but have not yet withdrawn, to app.sharpay.io and combined them with the token balance that you earned from sharing on app.sharpay.io (if any).  Short easy summary:  1. If you have tokens on sale.sharpay.io but have not yet withdrawn, please log in on sale.sharpay.io or app.sharpay.io using your email and password on sale.sharpay.io. 2. app.sharpay.io will be the only official website that store your tokens (tokens purchased in Token Sale and tokens earned from sharing), but you can always log in via sale.sharpay.io (the old way). 3. If you have 5,000 S tokens on sale.sharpay.io but have not yet withdrawn, and 300 S tokens on app.sharpay.io, now your token balance on app.sharpay.io will be 5,300 S tokens as we have combined them together. 4. If you do not have an account on app.sharpay.io, we have created one for you and you can log in app.sharpay.io using your email and password on sale.sharpay.io.  The procedure for withdrawing tokens remains unchanged. In the ‚ÄúWallet‚Äù section of your account, you need to define the amount of tokens (minimum 350 S tokens) and create a request to withdraw tokens to your personal ETH wallet address. Our system will automatically send you a withdrawal confirmation email, and you need to confirm it in order to withdraw your tokens successfully. After confirming the request within 24 hours, your tokens will be sent to your wallet.  üî∏ We have a very authoritative partner for the KYC process, Sum And Substance Ltd. (http://sumsub.com). We do not store your personal data. All the personal data is processed and stored by our partner, Sum And Substance Ltd, in accordance with the requirements of regulators from different countries.  If you have problem with logging in your account on app.sharpay.io, please contact us via email tokensale@sharpay.io.  In Sharing We Trust! Sharpay.io Team

Body: Dear Webmasters!  Webmasters are now able to add conversion events and reward Sharpay button users additional bonuses for their referrals!  Click and visit rate is important for websites, but visitor actions are critical in measuring their business growth. Conversion events allow webmasters to track the actions of site visitors who follow referral links on social networks shared by Sharpay button users.  The conversion event can be, for example, a simple click and visit, a form filling and submission, a purchase action. Sharpay button users who share referral links on their social networks will get additional conversion bonuses (set by webmasters) from their referrals.  All the site visitor actions will be recorded as event data and passed to Sharpay system using JavaScript. Thus, webmasters can track almost any visitor activity. Conversion events only work if visitors have clicked on referral links that shared using our Sharpay buttons.  How to create a conversion event:  1. Go to the Webmasters section and open the Edit project. 2. Open the Events tab and click on the Event settings button. 3. To create an event, specify its character Code (letters of the Latin alphabet, numbers and dashes are allowed). 4. Specify the Name of the event that will appear in the reports. 5. And the size of the Rate, which will be charged to the user for this event. 6. Click the Add Event button and save the changes.  Once the event is created to record visitor actions, it cannot be deleted. You can only deactivate it if you do not need it.  How it works:  1. User shares a referral link on his social networks using Sharpay button. 2. Visitor clicks on the referral link and performs actions on the website (e.g. register an account). 3. User gets an additional conversion bonus from visitor‚Äôs actions on the website set by webmaster.  Try our latest conversion events function (https://app.sharpay.io/index/events) now! We will keep improving our Sharpay buttons and adding more functions for you!  In Sharing We Trust! Sharpay.io Team

Title: ‚ú¥Ô∏è SHARPAY ‚ú¥Ô∏è Share button with blockchain rewards ‚úÖ Buy Now! ‚úÖ
Body: Hello Everyone!  Sharpay development update: added new features, fixed bugs and improved UI.  We have been developing and improving our Sharpay application to give everyone the best sharing experience and revolutionize the existing social media marketing.  Let us report you some of the new development:  1) Added token reward history on Wallet page. We have updated ‚ÄúTokens Available‚Äù (Green section) and ‚ÄúTokens under review‚Äù (Yellow section) on Wallet page, you are now able to see the detailed breakdown of token rewards and expenses on https://app.sharpay.io/profile/wallet.  2) Fixed blank transactions error. Not all types of transactions were displayed in user‚Äôs wallet before, and because of that, some users might encounter blank transactions (transaction notifications with no information). We have fixed it and now you can see different detailed transactions.  3) Fixed Facebook page email error. If you want to link your Facebook page to your account, by linking Facebook page we will automatically get your email address and update your profile. We have fixed an internal error that occurred when you refused to give us your Facebook email address.  4) Checked Facebook page API. Facebook released a new version of API for Facebook page, and we had to work on the permission to post content on page‚Äôs feed. Now, you can share content on your Facebook (Blue icon) and your Facebook Page (Red icon) that you manage.  5) Checked compatibility of our plugin in WordPress 5.0. WordPress 5.0 is scheduled to be released on November 19, we have tested the compatibility of our Sharpay plugin. You can install our plugin in 3.5 or higher version of WordPress.  We have also improved our application UI (user interface) if you may have noticed. For example, we have changed the token currency with our smart ‚ÄúS‚Äù logo on the top menu, improved the design of user‚Äôs token balance and table.  Stay tune for more development updates!  In Sharing We Trust! Sharpay.io Team

Body: Dear our beloved Sharpay (S) Token Holders!  Sharpay.io utility S token will be officially listed and opened for trading on OEX.com exchange on 26 Nov 2018.  After our hard work and intensive negotiation with a lot of exchanges for months, we are pleased to announce that our Sharpay.io utility S token for sites promotion is ready to list and open trading on OEX.com on 26 November 2018, one of the biggest crypto exchange in the world!  OEX exchange was found in Singapore in Sept 2017, it supports three different main languages, English, Chinese and Korean. It is very popular in Chinese speaking communities and it has many tens of thousands of members in its official social network groups. OEX exchange is well known for high user experience, high security, low threshold, and low transaction fee.  According to the adjusted trading volume on CoinMarketCap, OEX exchange is generally in the TOP 25 ‚Äì TOP 30 of the world‚Äôs cryptocurrency exchanges. Due to the volatility of trading volume, the exchange periodically moves from 15 to 30, sometimes it goes beyond this range, and it is normal. It is adjacent to some big exchanges like Bit-Z, Kraken and Bittrex: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges/  üîπ Launching time: 26 November 2018, 10:00 (GMT +8) üîπ Deposit time: 26 November 2018, 10:00 (GMT +8) üîπ Trading time: 26 November 2018, 12:00 (GMT +8) üîπ Withdrawal time: 29 November 2018, 10:00 (GMT +8) üîπ Launching zone: BTC & ETH trading zones  This is a huge step for the Sharpay team towards popularizing Sharpay (S) token and creating more liquidity.  We understand the recent fall in crypto market. Unfortunately, in this difficult market time, like most cryptocurrency companies, we did not receive any profit in the 2018' 3Q and our buyback program for Token Sale buyers is postponed for the next year. However, we believe that our new listing on OEX.com will bring more liquidity to our Sharapy (S) token, which will have a positive effect on profitability for our company!  Please keep calm in this difficult time and feel free to buy Sharpay (S) tokens while welcoming our new good listing on OEX.com! Now you can buy our Sharpay (S) tokens on these exchanges:  üî∏ IDEX: https://idex.market/eth/s üî∏ SIMEX: https://simex.global/en/exchange/s/eth üî∏ EtherDelta: https://etherdelta.com/#0x96b0bf939d9460095c15251f71fda11e41dcbddb-ETH  Thank you for your faith and support! Body: Dear Webmasters!  We are happy to announce: Sharpay share button with blockchain rewards is available on Cloudflare!  Cloudflare is one of the world‚Äôs largest technological platforms for site owners, admins and webmasters. More than 8 million Internet properties are on Cloudflare, and their network is growing by tens of thousands each day. It powers nearly 10 percent of all Internet requests for more than 2.8 billion people worldwide.  We have therefore developed our Sharapy app on Cloudflare, and now it is available to tens of millions of websites and users.  How to install Sharpay button on your website:  1. Open the management of your website on Cloudflare. 2. Go to ‚ÄúApps‚Äù tab and search ‚ÄúSharpay‚Äù. 3. Select Sharpay App and click "Preview on your site". 4. Click the Sharpay icon to login / register an account on Sharpay. 5. Confirm and connect your Sharpay account to Cloudflare. 6. In the "Select site" drop-down list, select your project. 7. Customize the widget and click "Install on all pages".  It‚Äôs so easy and fast to install Sharpay button on your website! Don‚Äôt waste your time, try it right now! - https://www.cloudflare.com/apps/sharpay  If you have any questions about our Sharpay app on Cloudflare, please do not hesitate to contact us!  In Sharing We Trust! Sharpay.io Team

Author: sharpay
Title: ‚ú¥Ô∏è SHARPAY ‚ú¥Ô∏è Share button with blockchain rewards ‚úÖ Buy Now! ‚úÖ
Body: Dear Community!  Sharpay token with ticker symbol "S" successfully listed on the largest decentralized exchange IDEX.  Many of you have asked many times that when we would list on IDEX. Despite the face that this is a decentralized exchange, the listing process was complicated, and we needed to go through a whole quest.  At our first inquiry about listing on IDEX, they unfortunately were not comfortable with the word ‚Äúprofit‚Äù in our description ‚Äúshare button with blockchain profit‚Äù. We had to spend a lot of time to explain to IDEX the meaning of ‚Äúprofit‚Äù and the fact that we do not distribute profits according to our White Paper. ‚ÄúProfit‚Äù is only a synonym for the word ‚Äúrewards‚Äù.   In the end, we had to replace our description ‚Äúshare button with blockchain profit‚Äù with ‚Äúshare button with blockchain rewards‚Äù everywhere (in our documents, on our websites and social networks), which is more accurate.  Also, an IDEX representative asked a lot of questions about real activities of our developers on GitHub. We explained that we have been developing our project in private GitHub repository, our team performs a lot of development tasks every day. We have sent 21 screenshots of developer activities over the past 2 months!  After an audit by IDEX representatives, we had a final Skype video call with the director from IDEX yesterday, and we were finally approved listing on IDEX by him.  IDEX is the largest decentralized exchange, congratulations! Trade successfully! https://idex.market/eth/s  In Sharing We Trust! Sharpay.io Team

Author: sharpay
Title: ‚ú¥Ô∏è SHARPAY ‚ú¥Ô∏è Share button with blockchain rewards ‚úÖ Buy Now! ‚úÖ
Body: Quote from: sharpay on August 31, 2018, 07:32:55 PM Dear Sharpay Token Holders!  As you know, some time ago we have announced the first listing of our S (Sharpay) token on SIMEX exchange: https://simex.global/en/exchange/s/usd  This is a good listing because SIMEX is a public US corporation from the list of TOP-15 cryptocurrency exchanges with good REAL volumes.  We received a lot of questions about trading on this exchange, about the market situation and the prospects of the price of our S token.  Some of you ask us about why it's so difficult to pass SIMEX verification? The answer is simple: because SIMEX operates in strict accordance with US laws. If you have any questions about verification, then you need to contact SIMEX support.  Many of you ask us about trading bots and whether the price of our S token on the SIMEX exchange is real? YES. Trading on SIMEX is real and shows the real market price of our S token. And about the trading bots. We would like to draw your attention to the fact that many professional traders use bots for effective trading. We do not trade our tokens. But we are positive about trading through bots.  Others ask why the market price of our token was gradually dumped? For us, this is the most painful question, but you must understand that all of the answers are simple, and reflect the whole market situation especially ETH and all altcoins!  We have been working on this project for many years, we have a REAL WORKING PRODUCT, we have filed several patent applications, our company has no analogs and competitors! Sharpay multisharing button with blockchain rewards is a unique product! And we get very angry when someone unreasonably and undeservedly accuses our team.  The community should not blame us for the fact that the entire cryptocurrency market has fallen 5 times in price! Over the past 6 months, ETH has fallen 5 times! All the cryptocurrencies are depreciating! This is not our fault. And the fall of the whole market has nothing to do with our Sharpay project. These are the realities of the whole market!  Things depend not only on us. We are pressed by the whole market. If the whole market falls, any of our costs will be ineffective. We need to work hard and wait for good conditions in the market.  We would like to remind you that according to the public poll of our international community, the results of which were published in the news (https://t.me/sharpay_io/300), about 74% of our community supported the idea to postpone the listing for an indefinite period, because now the market is at the bottom, demand for altcoins is minimal (!) and this can negatively affect the price of our S (Sharpay) token.  We are pleased that the volume of our trading is small. We are glad that the price of our token is not much lower than the nominal price. We agree with 74% of our community that now is not the right time to actively trade our tokens and you need to wait for a few months.  We have never said that buying our tokens could make quick profits. What did we say at Token Sale? We always said that we had a roadmap for several years ahead (!) and we were a unique company, because our product had no analogs in the world! Therefore, our tokens would be valuable in long term.  According to the rules of our Token Sale, buying our tokens was never an investment! We never promised any investment returns! The purchase of our tokens has always been and will be a chance to lose everything or to benefit. It's a chance, but not a guarantee! These are the usual standards for high-risk cryptocurrency purchases! And we believe that with our hard work we will make your risk minimal and justify your trust!  Our development plan was written on our Sharpay White Paper. All buyers should know this. All buyers need to read, wait and believe.  Our answer for each buyer remains the same. To get a good reward from buying our tokens, it takes many months and years of waiting. This is a purchase as a long-term contribution to the future! It is necessary to wait. And we believe that this expectation will pay back!  We follow our roadmap and we report on new developments every week. Each company has its own way of development. Now our information strategy is as it is. Over time, we will announce updates and news about our development and partnerships.  We openly communicate with any members of our community in one to one Telegram chat (this is much more effective than a public chat with an uncontrolled flood) and in all of our public social networks: Facebook, Twitter, Reddit, Steemit, Medium, BitcoinTalk. This is a huge open space. This is more than enough for effective communication of all members of our multinational community.  We will continue the weekly publication of news of our new developments, promotions, and partnerships. Thank you for your support!  In Sharing We Trust! Sharpay.io Team  Hi! I hope you have read our post. For us, we continue to develop our Sharpay button and promote it worldwide, get more partnerships. It is not healthy if we focus too much on the market price instead of our development, we should work hard and get more users. Right now, there are around 1000 websites using our Sharpay button, and we will publish and promote some of them every week. Also, according to White Paper, the buyback program runs in Q4 based on the project's profit results in Q3. We are currently summing up the results for the 3rd quarter. News about the buyback program will be published in November.  In Sharing We Trust! Sharpay.io Team

Title: ‚ú¥Ô∏è SHARPAY ‚ú¥Ô∏è Share button with blockchain rewards ‚úÖ Buy Now! ‚úÖ
Body: Dear Webmasters!  We have attracted lots of websites to install our Sharpay button. We recently improved the interface on ‚ÄúWebmaster Area‚Äù and added some functions for you to customize your own Sharpay buttons.  When you set up our Sharpay button on your website, you can choose different button types, ‚ÄúStatic‚Äù, ‚ÄúFloating‚Äù and ‚ÄúCustom‚Äù. Let‚Äôs talk about their settings:  1) ‚ÄúLanguage‚Äù: You can customize and choose ‚ÄúEnglish‚Äù, ‚ÄúChinese‚Äù, ‚ÄúKorean‚Äù or ‚ÄúRussian‚Äù for your button.  2) ‚ÄúShare counter‚Äù: If you want to show the how many times your website was shared using Sharpay button, you can select and enable ‚ÄúShare counter‚Äù. There are two opinions ‚ÄúSeparate for every page‚Äù (show the number of shares individually) or ‚ÄúCommon for all site‚Äù (show the total number of shares).  If you want to have a simple fixed button on your website, you can choose ‚ÄúStatic‚Äù. You can change its size (‚Äú32px‚Äù, ‚Äú24px‚Äù or ‚Äú16px‚Äù) to fit your web design, you can also adjust the size by changing value in ‚Äúdata-height‚Äù.  Some of you may want to have a beautiful animated button, you can choose ‚ÄúFloating‚Äù, position the button and choose background color to displace it on your website. You can also select ‚ÄúMini widget‚Äù to minimize and simplify the design.  However, if you want to customize your Sharpay button, you can go ‚ÄúCustom‚Äù. Keep the necessary codes and JavaScript, you may design your own Sharpay button for your website!  Copy and paste the codes onto your website, try it and find the best design!  In Sharing We Trust! Sharpay.io Team

Author: sharpay
Title: ‚ú¥Ô∏è SHARPAY ‚ú¥Ô∏è Share button with blockchain rewards ‚úÖ Buy Now! ‚úÖ
Body: It's simple. IDEX has not yet confirmed our first listing request. They were frightened by the word "profit" in our description (share button with blockchain profit). They thought it was a sign of security token. We explained to them that the word "profit" is only part of our slogan and has nothing to do with the distribution of profits. Also, we replaced everywhere (in all our documents and on the site) the word "profit" with the word "rewards" (share button with blockchain rewards) and submitted a new application for IDEX. Now we are waiting.  But most importantly, we are working on other more serious listings.

Author: sharpay
Title: ‚ú¥Ô∏è SHARPAY ‚ú¥Ô∏è Share button with blockchain rewards ‚úÖ Buy Now! ‚úÖ
Body: Dear Sharpay Tokens Holders!  We would like to remind all of our tokens holders that you can withdraw your Sharpay S tokens on https://sale.sharpay.io/.  In order to withdraw your tokens successfully, you need to 1) Pass KYC, 2) Enter your personal Ethereum Wallet address and 3) Withdraw and confirm it via email.  1) How to Pass KYC:  The KYC aims to protect Sharpay Inc. from money laundering and financing of terrorism risks. To pass the KYC, please go to your personal account on https://sale.sharpay.io/ (ONLY on this site!).  üî∏ If you have 150,000 or more Sharpay Tokens (Full KYC):  Please read and follow our guide here: https://steemit.com/cryptocurrency/@sharpay/our-kyc-procedure  üî∏ If you have less than 150,000 Sharpay Tokens (Simple KYC):  We have updated our system and you will see a SIMPLE KYC button next your account balance (https://sale.sharpay.io/cabinet/home). Please click ‚ÄúStart‚Äù to begin and you will need to fill in all the required fields: ‚ÄúFull name‚Äù, ‚ÄúPhone‚Äù, ‚ÄúAge‚Äù and ‚ÄúCountry‚Äù.  You need to enter your Full Legal Name (with spaces between your last name, middle name (if any) and Last name, but not your Email Address.  üîπ Simple KYC Result: Please complete the Simple KYC and check your account after 24 hours. If you can see a ‚ÄúWallet‚Äù section next to your account balance, it means you have passed the Simple KYC.  For more about our KYC policies, please read here: https://steemit.com/cryptocurrency/@sharpay/we-will-perform-kyc-procedure-for-all-our-buyers  2) Enter your personal Ethereum Wallet Address:  If you have passed the KYC, you will be able to see a ‚ÄúWallet‚Äù section next to your Sharpay token balance. Please click ‚ÄúEnter ETH wallet address‚Äù, and you will see a pop-up window, enter ONLY your personal Ethereum Wallet Address. Please make sure your Ethereum Wallet supports adding ‚ÄúERC20 custom tokens‚Äù.  ‚ùó We DO NOT accept any ETH addresses from exchanges and other addresses. If you enter not a personal ETH wallet address, for example, an address from the exchange, then you will lose all your S (Sharpay) tokens! There is NO recovery of funds if you make any mistakes while withdrawing your S (Sharpay) tokens. We WILL NOT be able to recover them if you send them to a wallet you do not control!  3) Withdraw and confirm it via email:  If you have entered your personal Ethereum Wallet address, please click "Withdraw Tokens" under your Sharpay token balance, it will ask you to confirm the Ethereum Wallet Address again and send you a withdrawal confirmation link to your email.  ‚ùó When you click the withdrawal confirmation link, please make sure you're using the same browser and have already logged in to your account. If you cannot click the withdrawal confirmation link, please copy the whole link and paste it into your browser address bar.  If your withdrawal request is confirmed and accepted, you will receive a green message stating the withdrawal request is received. Please refresh your account and the ‚ÄúWithdraw tokens‚Äù button will be gone.   After that, please go to your personal Ethereum wallet and add S (Sharpay) tokens (Add Custom Ethereum ERC20 Tokens) to your wallet. You will need to enter the following values: - Token Name (optional): Sharpay - Token Contract Address: 0x96B0bF939D9460095C15251F71Fda11e41DcBddB - Token Symbol: S - Decimals: 18  If you have any questions regarding your KYC or the token withdrawal, please do not hesitate to contact us!  In Sharing We Trust! Sharpay.io Team

Author: sharpay
Title: ‚ú¥Ô∏è SHARPAY ‚ú¥Ô∏è Share button with blockchain rewards ‚úÖ Buy Now! ‚úÖ
Body: Dear Sharpay Token Holders!  As you know, some time ago we have announced the first listing of our S (Sharpay) token on SIMEX exchange: https://simex.global/en/exchange/s/usd  This is a good listing because SIMEX is a public US corporation from the list of TOP-15 cryptocurrency exchanges with good REAL volumes.  We received a lot of questions about trading on this exchange, about the market situation and the prospects of the price of our S token.  Some of you ask us about why it's so difficult to pass SIMEX verification? The answer is simple: because SIMEX operates in strict accordance with US laws. If you have any questions about verification, then you need to contact SIMEX support.  Many of you ask us about trading bots and whether the price of our S token on the SIMEX exchange is real? YES. Trading on SIMEX is real and shows the real market price of our S token. And about the trading bots. We would like to draw your attention to the fact that many professional traders use bots for effective trading. We do not trade our tokens. But we are positive about trading through bots.  Others ask why the market price of our token was gradually dumped? For us, this is the most painful question, but you must understand that all of the answers are simple, and reflect the whole market situation especially ETH and all altcoins!  We have been working on this project for many years, we have a REAL WORKING PRODUCT, we have filed several patent applications, our company has no analogs and competitors! Sharpay multisharing button with blockchain rewards is a unique product! And we get very angry when someone unreasonably and undeservedly accuses our team.  The community should not blame us for the fact that the entire cryptocurrency market has fallen 5 times in price! Over the past 6 months, ETH has fallen 5 times! All the cryptocurrencies are depreciating! This is not our fault. And the fall of the whole market has nothing to do with our Sharpay project. These are the realities of the whole market!  Things depend not only on us. We are pressed by the whole market. If the whole market falls, any of our costs will be ineffective. We need to work hard and wait for good conditions in the market.  We would like to remind you that according to the public poll of our international community, the results of which were published in the news (https://t.me/sharpay_io/300), about 74% of our community supported the idea to postpone the listing for an indefinite period, because now the market is at the bottom, demand for altcoins is minimal (!) and this can negatively affect the price of our S (Sharpay) token.  We are pleased that the volume of our trading is small. We are glad that the price of our token is not much lower than the nominal price. We agree with 74% of our community that now is not the right time to actively trade our tokens and you need to wait for a few months.  We have never said that buying our tokens could make quick profits. What did we say at Token Sale? We always said that we had a roadmap for several years ahead (!) and we were a unique company, because our product had no analogs in the world! Therefore, our tokens would be valuable in long term.  According to the rules of our Token Sale, buying our tokens was never an investment! We never promised any investment returns! The purchase of our tokens has always been and will be a chance to lose everything or to benefit. It's a chance, but not a guarantee! These are the usual standards for high-risk cryptocurrency purchases! And we believe that with our hard work we will make your risk minimal and justify your trust!  Our development plan was written on our Sharpay White Paper. All buyers should know this. All buyers need to read, wait and believe.  Our answer for each buyer remains the same. To get a good reward from buying our tokens, it takes many months and years of waiting. This is a purchase as a long-term contribution to the future! It is necessary to wait. And we believe that this expectation will pay back!  We follow our roadmap and we report on new developments every week. Each company has its own way of development. Now our information strategy is as it is. Over time, we will announce updates and news about our development and partnerships.  We openly communicate with any members of our community in one to one Telegram chat (this is much more effective than a public chat with an uncontrolled flood) and in all of our public social networks: Facebook, Twitter, Reddit, Steemit, Medium, BitcoinTalk. This is a huge open space. This is more than enough for effective communication of all members of our multinational community.  We will continue the weekly publication of news of our new developments, promotions, and partnerships. Thank you for your support!  In Sharing We Trust! Sharpay.io Team

Author: pdramorim
Title: ‚ú¥Ô∏è SHARPAY ‚ú¥Ô∏è Share button with blockchain rewards ‚úÖ Buy Now! ‚úÖ
Body: Lol, nothing against noobs, but I assure you that isn't the case. I've been involved in plenty of ICOs (good and bad), but this is the first one that I've seen unlocking tokens before listing on an official exchange.  Of course dumpers will always dump no matter what, but there's a reason why successful ICOs all lock their tokens until they are first listed on an exchange: it drives demand and prevents price drops before markets are even aware of it. I too voted to list later, but what good will that do now if people are already trading them anyway? Price has dropped already, they took away any hype factor that might have still existed by doing that.  And what makes you think I am whining about money I can't afford to lose? I wouldn't have invested it if that was the case, but that doesn't mean I don't care what happens to it.  Happy that you're happy with the way this ICO is being handled. I'm personally not pleased with certain aspects, so as an investor I think I'm entitled to seek clarification from the team on the only public forum that they have made available.

Author: sharpay
Title: ‚ú¥Ô∏è SHARPAY ‚ú¥Ô∏è Share button with blockchain rewards ‚úÖ Buy Now! ‚úÖ
Body: Official announcement of the beginning of trading S (Sharpay) tokens on the open international cryptocurrency market.  Dear friends! Dear community! Buyers and token holders!  Today is the day when we are ready to make an official announcement about the first listing of our S tokens on the crypto exchange market!  We promised you that this week we will make an official announcement about the start of trading. We keep our promise.  The first exchange where you can officially buy and sell our S tokens is SIMEX: https://simex.global/en/exchange/s/eth.  SIMEX is a multifunctional online international digital asset management, investment, and trading platform. Transfers between accounts and to accounts of third parties, deposit / withdraw from linked debit cards.  According to the official rating of CoinMarketCap, the exchange takes the 14th place in the TOP 15 of the world's cryptocurrency exchange trading systems: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges/  Currently, our S token is opened for trading in these pairs: S / ETH, S / BTC, S / USD.  The platform interface is available in English and not only. We know that our multinational community, including large Korean and Chinese communities, are waiting for the opportunity to trade in their own languages. Unfortunately, the platform has not yet been translated into some major Asian languages. But we promise that soon we will make new listings on other exchanges and our multinational community will be able to trade in their own languages!  To start trading on the SIMEX platform, you need to register and verify your account.  According to Sharpay White Paper, the initial price of placing the tokens corresponds to the nominal price of our token and is equal to 0.00003 ETH. Bidding has already begun a few days ago. At the moment, the market price of our token in the S / ETH pair is 0.00003996 ETH, which is about 30% higher than the nominal price!  As we announced a few days ago, according to the collective opinion of our experts, the entire market of cryptocurrency is now at the bottom and is preparing to make a new ascent up. We encourage all users not to rush to sell S tokens. This is a good start! This is our first step towards the common success! Congratulations! Buy Now!  In Sharing We Trust! Sharpay.io Team

Author: sharpay
Title: ‚ú¥Ô∏è SHARPAY ‚ú¥Ô∏è Share button with blockchain rewards ‚úÖ Buy Now! ‚úÖ
Body: Dear Sharpay Token Holders!  Many of you have successfully passed your KYC and withdrawn your Sharpay ERC20 S-tokens to your personal Ethereum addresses. We have received a lot of questions from you: ‚ÄúWhen listing? What exchanges?‚Äù.  We have been working on our Sharpay product and we already have a real working button that has been using by a lot of websites and users. We often announce our new partnerships and development features (almost every week) to keep our community up to date on our Sharpay project.  At the same time, listing on exchanges is definitely a very important task to us.  However, as you know the crypto currency market has been falling significantly. According to our research, almost all new projects have completed Token Sales and listed on exchanges recently, their token prices have fallen so much. Some very large projects, which raised tens of millions of dollars, perform even worse than others. Their token prices have fallen 5 times or more below their ICO prices!  Now, it is a very bad time for listing. We do not want our token price fall like all others! We already have agreements with exchanges, but perhaps we can wait and list on exchanges until the market recovers? We would like to hear your opinion, our community‚Äôs opinion. So, we have decided to create a public poll on Telegram.  Direct link: https://t.me/sharpay_io/300  We are waiting for your answers! Please note that the results of the poll will only be used for listing advisory purpose.  In Sharing We Trust! Sharpay.io Team

Author: sharpay
Title: ‚ú¥Ô∏è SHARPAY ‚ú¥Ô∏è Share button with blockchain rewards ‚úÖ Buy Now! ‚úÖ
Body: Dear Sharpay Token Holders!  It has been almost a week since we launched an opinion poll about listing on exchanges. We have received a lot of comments and support. And furthermore, we consulted with our advisors and experts. Now we would like to announce our decision.   As we all know, this month, the collective capitalization of all cryptocurrencies hit rock bottom ‚Äî $189 billion. Almost all new projects, that have recently completed Token Sales and listed on exchanges, suffer a downward price trend, their token price has fallen below ICO price.  The experts believe that the market is in a poor condition these days and that there is no time to wait. We tend to agree with this position. The market might be not looking good now, but we believe that the prices will eventually go up and we need to start rising with the market together.  Moreover, there are interested buyers who can purchase our tokens anytime they want, and our token holders can buy more or sell at market price. Also, with regard to voting, a quarter of users suggest us to list on exchanges as soon as possible.   We have waited enough, it is time to act now. We are ready to do the first listing.  The exchange that we have chosen is now in the list of Top 15 global crypto exchanges with the largest trading volumes. It will help us to demonstrate to the public at large our trade capacity. The next step will be a public listing on CoinMarketCap which will open the window of opportunity for future listings on larger exchanges.  We understand that some of you wanted to wait and postpone listing on exchanges for better times, but taking into consideration current market trends, experts' advice, voting results and possible risks we have made a decision to list on exchanges in the nearest future for our community's best interest.   We will announce our first listing and provide more details later this week. Thank you all for your support and patience.  In Sharing We Trust! Sharpay.io Team

Author: sharpay
Title: ‚ú¥Ô∏è SHARPAY ‚ú¥Ô∏è Share button with blockchain rewards ‚úÖ Buy Now! ‚úÖ
Body: Dear Sharpay Token Holders!  We have officially made the emission of our ERC20 Sharpay tokens! Congratulations! Here is the token contract: https://etherscan.io/token/0x96B0bF939D9460095C15251F71Fda11e41DcBddB  We are pleased to announce that you can withdraw your Sharpay tokens that you have purchased during our Token Sale. We are especially thankful for your tremendous support and your patience.  We had been using "SHRP" as our Sharpay token symbol, but we have decided to change it to "S" and give everyone a fresh, simpler and cooler symbol! There is no other token called "S"! "S" is like our Sharpay logo, and it is not only the first letter of Sharpay but also the symbol of Superman!  ‚ùó The tokens will be released in different batches and priority will be given to early buyers. If you cannot find the withdraw button, please check it again the next day. All buyers should be able to withdraw their tokens within this week.  üî∏ Please note that, you can only withdraw your ERC20 Sharpay tokens if you have passed the KYC and entered your personal Ethereum wallet address in your personal account on https://sale.sharpay.io (The only official website to get your Sharpay tokens). How to add ERC20 Sharpay tokens to your personal Ethereum wallet:  1) Please log in to your account on https://sale.sharpay.io and confirm your personal Ethereum wallet address. If you have not added your personal Ethereum wallet address, please read our guide here: https://steemit.com/crypto/@sharpay/you-can-add-your-personal-eth-wallet-address  2) Click "Withdraw Tokens" under your Sharpay token balance.  3) After that, please go to your personal Ethereum wallet and add Sharpay tokens (Add Custom Ethereum ERC20 Tokens) to your wallet. You will need to enter the following values: - Token Name: Sharpay - Token Contract Address: 0x96B0bF939D9460095C15251F71Fda11e41DcBddB - Token Symbol: S - Decimals: 18  ‚ùó We DO NOT accept any ETH addresses from exchanges and other addresses. If you enter not a personal ETH wallet address, for example, an address from the exchange, then you will lose all your Sharpay tokens! In this case, we WILL NOT be able to restore your Sharpay token balance!  ‚ùó There is NO recovery of funds if you make any mistakes while withdrawing your Sharpay tokens. We WILL NOT be able to recover them if you send them to a wallet you do not control!  ‚ùó We have never asked you and will never ask you for your passwords or private keys!  If you have any questions regarding your KYC or the token withdrawal, please do not hesitate to contact us!  In Sharing We Trust! Sharpay.io Team

Author: sharpay
Title: ‚ú¥Ô∏è SHARPAY ‚ú¥Ô∏è Share button with blockchain rewards ‚úÖ Buy Now! ‚úÖ
Body: Why is multisharing so trendy today?  Sharing (technology of dissemination of information in social networks) appeared on the market more than 10 years ago. Then there were several independent start-ups that played the role of its popularizers - they made it possible to combine different social networks into a single unit and customize them for the site design. Today, the buttons of these services are installed only 3-5% of the total number of sites. Over this period of time (more than 10 years), in the operation of the aggregators of sharing, nothing has changed fundamentally - the limited methods of their monetization made the development of this industry meaningless and unattractive for developers.  The multisharing button, developed by our Sharpay company, is making a real breakthrough in the sharing. The use of blockchain technology in our share button has become a powerful impetus for the development of Internet marketing as it will help both sites, which use our button, and users, who share the information, to earn! No one share button has provided a such opportunity before. Moreover,  Sharpay provides multisharing of information, which allows users to place the content on all their own pages in social networks just in a one click! Sharpay button is a sharing button of next generation!  In Sharing We Trust! https://sharpay.io

Body: Hi! Yes, all the unsold tokens will be transferred to company reserve for further sales to Webmasters.  When the Token Sale is completed but the listing on exchanges is not executed yet, if this occurs, tokens can be sold at a nominal price. We will take into consideration the project‚Äôs features, White Paper and a need of selling tokens to sites from the reserve.  When our tokens are listed on the exchanges, the market price will appear, then tokens will be sold at the market price (in case the price is higher). If the market price is below the nominal value (which is not excluded, taking into account volatility periods), tokens will be sold at nominal price (which is almost equivalent to the absence of sales from the system, as they can be bought cheaper on the exchanges).  For more, please read: https://steemit.com/sharpay/@sharpay/we-are-always-glad-to-help-you  In Sharing We Trust!

Body: Dear Sharpay tokens holders!  We, Sharpay Inc. (registered in Belize), follow the ‚ÄúAnti-Money Laundering And Combating the Financing of Terrorism (AML/CFT) Guidelines‚Äù issued by the Central Bank of Belize, therefore, we will perform KYC (Know Your Customer) procedure for all our buyers.  As some of our buyers might notice, we have started the KYC procedure at the beginning of last week. Some of our buyers saw the KYC buttons in their personal accounts. But unfortunately, around the same time, we were under a phishing attack. We had to stop the KYC procedure immediately to protect our users‚Äô data.  We successfully resisted the phishing attack. We made sure that all the data of our buyers were safe, all buyers‚Äô tokens were securely protected and the impact of the attack was minimal to us. And now we will start the KYC procedure.  The KYC aims to protect Sharpay Inc. from money laundering and financing of terrorism risks. To pass the KYC, please go to your personal account on https://sale.sharpay.io/ (ONLY on this site!).  üî∏ If you have 150,000 or more Sharpay Tokens:  You will need to complete a FULL KYC with supporting documents. You will see a KYC section next to your account balance (https://sale.sharpay.io/cabinet/home) and you can click ‚ÄúStart‚Äù to begin. You will need to upload the following documents: ‚ÄúProof of identity‚Äù, ‚ÄúSelfie with the proof‚Äù and ‚ÄúProof of address‚Äù.  üî∏ If you have less than 150,000 Sharpay Tokens:  There will be no KYC button for you and you will need to complete a SIMPLE KYC, please go to your ‚ÄúProfile‚Äù section (https://sale.sharpay.io/cabinet/profile) and fill in all the required fields: ‚ÄúFull name‚Äù, ‚ÄúPhone‚Äù, ‚ÄúAge‚Äù and ‚ÄúCountry‚Äù.  Once you have submitted all the required documents (for Full KYC) and fields, and they were reviewed by the system with no problems, your KYC will be considered passed. The verification process usually takes a few minutes, but it may take up to 24 hours. The result of Full KYC will be sent to your personal email, you can also check it on your account (https://sale.sharpay.io/cabinet/home).  In some cases, we will require some buyers who are considered to be suspicious by our system to complete the FULL KYC even they have smaller balances, but we will not disclose the criteria and the standards.  We have a very authoritative partner for the KYC process, Sum And Substance Ltd. (http://sumsub.com). We do not store your personal data. All the personal data is processed and stored by our partner, Sum And Substance Ltd, in accordance with the requirements of regulators from different countries.  Simply fill in all the required fields and upload all the required documents for the KYC. If you do not pass the KYC we will contact you directly and notify you about further steps. If you have any questions, or you have difficulties with passing the KYC, please contact us via support@sharpay.io  The next stage after KYC will be the token distribution. Stay tuned for more updates!  ‚ÄúAnti-Money Laundering And Combating the Financing of Terrorism (AML/CFT) Guidelines‚Äù: https://www.centralbank.org.bz/docs/default-source/2.5-money-laundering-terrorism(prevension)-act/aml-cft-guidelines-june-2010.pdf?sfvrsn=2  In Sharing We Trust! https://sharpay.io

Author: sharpay
Title: ‚ú¥Ô∏è SHARPAY ‚ú¥Ô∏è Share button with blockchain rewards ‚úÖ Buy Now! ‚úÖ
Body: Dear friends!  We get a lot of questions about our tokens and our own blockchain. Today we want to tell you about our plans related to these items.  1. At the end of the main Token Sale, we will issue the ERC20 tokens and credit them to all our customers to personal wallets.  2. After listing of our tokens on the exchanges, all buyers will be able to sell and buy our ERC20 tokens. The listing is scheduled after June. We do not inform in advance whom we are negotiating with, this is prohibited by the rules of exchanges. But we will let you know when everything is ready!  3. Our users who did not buy, but receive tokens for sharing, will also be able to sell tokens on exchanges. For this, a minimum threshold will be established, from which it will be possible to make transfers. The size of the threshold will be reported in the future.  4. Then, according to the plan in 2019, we will launch our high-speed blockchain with cheap transactions and make the migration of tokens. After that, the holders of a small number of our tokens will be able to make transfers from the Sharpay system to the exchanges.  5. Creating of our own blockchain is very important for us, because we need a full cycle ecosystem.  6. At the same time, there is an alternative. From experienced blockchain enthusiasts and members of our community, we periodically receive recommendations to make migration from ERC20 not to our own blockchain, but to use EOS or Ripple, for example. They argue this by the fact that it will optimize our system and increase the capitalization of our tokens due to synergy with a large blockchain.  7. We consider with interest and analyze such variants of the development.  8. The question of having of our own blockchain is tactical. Our goal is not to use our own blockchain, but the successful realization of the project as a whole growth of our capitalization.  We understand perfectly that it is not so important for all our token holders, what kind of blockchain we will be, it is important for everyone that we are successful! If we are successful, you will be happy, won‚Äôt you?  We will keep you informed about the results of our research and decisions!  In Sharing We Trust! Body: We periodically receive the questions about the security of users‚Äô accounts in the system and whether 2FA (Two-Factor Authentication) is available. We are glad to answer you:  üîπ On March 20, we launched 2FA in custom multisharing accounts https://app.sharpay.io/ üî∏5 May we made 2FA in payment accounts of our Token Sale https://sale.sharpay.io/  We remind you that at this stage users‚Äô tokens received for sharing and tokens purchased on Token Sale are technically located in different accounts of our system that are independent from each other. After the end of Token Sale user accounts will be combined.  If you still have questions about the connection of two-factor authentication, we are pleased to provide you with the instructions:  üîπTo activate 2FA in the sharing account (https://app.sharpay.io/), you need: - go to the section "Account Security" and in the section "Two-step authentication check" - click on the button "Not active" - after clicking on the button, the QR code will be displayed for configuring 2FA through the Google Authenticator application and a passphrase for access recovery will be requested - after adding the code to your device, you should enter a one-time password from GA to confirm - the setting is complete.  üî∏To activate 2FA in the payment account of Token Sale (https://sale.sharpay.io/), you need: - go to your profile and click "Activate" in the "Two-factor Authentication" section - after clicking on the button you will need to enter your password - next, you will see the QR code for configuring 2FA through the Google Authenticator application or another compatible application - after adding the code to your device, enter a one-time password from GA to confirm - the setting is complete.  Now your accounts are under double protection! Now you can be sure of additional security and safety of the tokens!  In Sharing We Trust! Token Sale 30% Bonus! ‚úÖ Buy Now! https://sharpay.io

Body: We guess you probably wondered why our sign is a dog, and why our project‚Äôs name is ‚ÄúSharpay‚Äù. It‚Äôs time to tell you all about.  The project itself has a large background and prehistory! A few years ago when we just started creating it we called our project ‚ÄúMultishare‚Äù. That name was chosen due to the main function of the project‚Ää‚Äî‚ÄäMulti+sharing (an ability to share content to several social networks in just one click).  Later on when blockchain technologies started gaining huge popularity, and tokenization appeared and became trendy; we decided to add another part, an extra word explaining other main feature of the project‚Ää‚Äî‚Äätoken payment for sharing. Thus, the first four letters of our project‚Äôs name are based on the verb ‚Äúshare‚Äù, and the last three ones‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääcome from the verb ‚Äúpay‚Äù. Putting them all together, we get‚Ää‚Äî‚Ää‚ÄúSharpay‚Äù: share and pay in one word.  Since this word is consonant with the breed of dogs shar-pei in many languages, we took our decision to select shar-pei dog as our symbol and Sharpay is our project‚Äôs name. Body: Why is multisharing so trendy today?  Sharing (technology of dissemination of information in social networks) appeared on the market more than 10 years ago. Then there were several independent start-ups that played the role of its popularizers - they made it possible to combine different social networks into a single unit and customize them for the site design. Today, the buttons of these services are installed only 3-5% of the total number of sites. Over this period of time (more than 10 years), in the operation of the aggregators of sharing, nothing has changed fundamentally - the limited methods of their monetization made the development of this industry meaningless and unattractive for developers.  The multisharing button, developed by our Sharpay company, is making a real breakthrough in the sharing. The use of blockchain technology in our share button has become a powerful impetus for the development of Internet marketing as it will help both sites, which use our button, and users, who share the information, to earn! No one share button has provided a such opportunity before. Moreover,  Sharpay provides multisharing of information, which allows users to place the content on all their own pages in social networks just in a one click! Currently, tokens are accrued and accounted for in the registry immediately after purchase in your personal wallet on sale.sharpay.io.  In our case, we are developing our new blockchain, which is not based on Ethereum, but is the fork of the more faster BitShares blockchain. Author: Amco01
Title: ‚ú¥Ô∏è SHARPAY ‚ú¥Ô∏è Share button with blockchain rewards ‚úÖ Buy Now! ‚úÖ
Body: I think you are making a big mistake ignoring social media and community building because you say it doesn‚Äôt work. I am an early invester because i believe in the product but am afraid i will not get a good roi. I assume you are inexperienced as an ico invester? Why do i think you need to step it up asap marketing wise? - A good product, all star team, good tokenmetrics AND a bit of hype/talked about in social media is the key to succes. Maybe in 2017 a good product and icobench rating was enough but with all those ico‚Äôs (and a lot with already working good products) flooding the markets (hundreds), ppl have to choose were to invest in. They score the before mentioned items and if 1 fails it means no investment. Sharpay lacks hype. It‚Äôs not talked about, nothing on youtube, i don‚Äôt see any community supporting it, no recommendations at all in any social media. - Telegram is an important way to keep in touch, ask questions, talk about the product, pro‚Äôs/con‚Äôs of investing, inviting new potential investors/community members, mobilising ppl if needed. For instance public voting to get on popular exchanges you need to mobilise ppl in telegram (lots of examples lately), a lot of famous youtubers with a lot of followers are asking which coin or ico to feature in their youtube video and if you have a strong community they will tell your name to the youtuber, if you want ppl to mention sharpay in social media you need to stay in touch with your community actively (telegram). To be honest i forgot about sharpay so mentioned other ico‚Äôs which i am in telegram group instead of sharpay. - I know there are a couple of shiller youtubers. They are kind of annoying but they have a lot of followers and can actually help make ico‚Äôs/coins succesfull. And if you have a good product does it matter if they shill? Even some paid reviews on youtube to start with is not bad imo.  But all that being said. It is not too late to start a telegram group at least. Contact some (paid) youtubers etc

Author: Mith19
Title: ‚ú¥Ô∏è SHARPAY ‚ú¥Ô∏è Share button with blockchain rewards ‚úÖ Buy Now! ‚úÖ
Body: It is a combination of different things. You lead me directly to first point -- I know of course who you are, but I guess most of the people while skimming and scanning might not realize who replied there (no offense). In your profile to my opinion sharpay should be mentioned at least once, but nothing at all :-(  But okay, now to some points, which could be given as examples according to what I was referring to in my first post:  (1) The product video - does not communicate what sharpay could be used for - does not arbitrate the needed level of expertise which is needed to convince people to invest (which you guys definitely have) - is ridiculous, because in the end it does not transport any information in an acceptable way at all.  (2) Bitcointalk Bounty campaign. This is so important, I don't get why you are telling the opposite. Via this sharpay gets present to a lot of peoples minds, so they can associate something with products name. Apparently there is also some miscommunication within the team - you tell me it will be not used while your official project account is writing that it will be announced soon. Strange! And definitely not ideal.  (3) Logo/symbol The logo - or let's say the symbol, this big fat ugly dog. I know why you guys are using it and that it is a pun. But come on, there is a certain point where you have to get rid of this. It really generates a strange impression, because 95% (I guess more) people are just asking themselves why this shitty dog is placed so omnipresent on your website and unfortunately also in your video.  (4) Social Media USE IT MORE. Your twitter e.g. is more or less dead. Force people to know what sharpay is and why it is so special so that they don't even have another chance than to invest.  (5) Medial coverage Some reports of big youtubers or a review article in cointelegraph would defintely help a lot. I know that you give examples of medial coverage on your website, but honestly, nobody reads cryptosrus.    Moreover I just have to approve what my previous speaker has already contributed, all points make absolutely sense.  Quote from: Amco01 on March 06, 2018, 08:27:49 AM    I think you are making a big mistake ignoring social media and community building because you say it doesn‚Äôt work. I am an early invester because i believe in the product but am afraid i will not get a good roi. I assume you are inexperienced as an ico invester? Why do i think you need to step it up asap marketing wise? - A good product, all star team, good tokenmetrics AND a bit of hype/talked about in social media is the key to succes. Maybe in 2017 a good product and icobench rating was enough but with all those ico‚Äôs (and a lot with already working good products) flooding the markets (hundreds), ppl have to choose were to invest in. They score the before mentioned items and if 1 fails it means no investment. Sharpay lacks hype. It‚Äôs not talked about, nothing on youtube, i don‚Äôt see any community supporting it, no recommendations at all in any social media. - Telegram is an important way to keep in touch, ask questions, talk about the product, pro‚Äôs/con‚Äôs of investing, inviting new potential investors/community members, mobilising ppl if needed. For instance public voting to get on popular exchanges you need to mobilise ppl in telegram (lots of examples lately), a lot of famous youtubers with a lot of followers are asking which coin or ico to feature in their youtube video and if you have a strong community they will tell your name to the youtuber, if you want ppl to mention sharpay in social media you need to stay in touch with your community actively (telegram). To be honest i forgot about sharpay so mentioned other ico‚Äôs which i am in telegram group instead of sharpay. - I know there are a couple of shiller youtubers. They are kind of annoying but they have a lot of followers and can actually help make ico‚Äôs/coins succesfull. And if you have a good product does it matter if they shill? Even some paid reviews on youtube to start with is not bad imo.  But all that being said. It is not too late to start a telegram group at least. Contact some (paid) youtubers etc    To me it is not comprehensible why nobody of the team replied. Potential investors are always observing if a team is active and community-friendly or not.   To put it in a nutshell, you/we have to attract peoples attention. This is also true for people, who might not be interested in the project itself, but who are convinced that it will have success because so many others are ... and then also invest!  But this will not be realized with pictures of puppy-dogs and non-informative silent films.

Author: @sheriff
Title: ‚ú¥Ô∏è SHARPAY ‚ú¥Ô∏è Share button with blockchain rewards ‚úÖ Buy Now! ‚úÖ
Body: Quote from: Ali_G007 on January 23, 2018, 05:22:00 PM I am sending ETH from exchange, but you ave never asked me for my ether wallet address. So how you going to transfer my coin to my wallet?  Hi! According to our White Paper, the actual emission of ERC20 standard SHRP tokens will be after the end of the total Token Sale. Currently, tokens are accrued and accounted for in the registry immediately after purchase in your personal wallet on sale.sharpay.io.  In our case, we are developing our new blockchain, which is not based on Ethereum, but is the fork of the more faster BitShares blockchain. Therefore, we do not exclude the fact that by the time of the official Token Sale launch we will immediately issue tokens already on our blockchain, instead of the ERC20 standard.   If this does not happen as quickly as we want, then according to the plan we will issue SHRP tokens on the  ERC20 standard and will be credited to your wallets for safe storage and future to exchange the tokens of our new blockchain based SHRP token.  A special field for adding your ETH address is now hidden in our settings and will appear in your account after Token Sale in June 2018.  Presale Bonus 50%! ‚úÖ  Buy Now!

Body: What distinguishes the project from Sharpay analogues?  Our most important difference from existing sharing systems is the synthesis of the blockchain system, which makes our system as transparent as possible and allows us to effectively stimulate the audience to promote content in the world networks with the help of tokens.  How it works?  It‚Äôs is very simple. The company or the site owner acquires Sharpay tokens and determines the targeting of their content. Users begin to disseminate content in social networks, blogs, instant messengers, on forums. For each user who has used the Sharpay multi- sharing button, an account will be created in our system and assigned a rating. Depending on the rating and the number of follows the link to the targeted audience, the user will be charged a certain number of tokens.  Tokens earned in the Sharpay system can be sold by the holder to the exchange or to the company of Sharpay under the buy-back program. As the exchange market develops, Sharpay tokens can be converted to other crypto and fiat currencies.  Presale Bonus 50%! ‚úÖ Buy Now!

Body: Sharing top news, creative ideas and interesting thoughts have always been fashionable things. The Internet and online networks have made these processes more popular - people actively post interesting information in social networks, blogs, forums. Such a massive info dissemination is a very powerful tool to promote and attract traffic to sites. Traffic brings them an increase in revenue, business growth and reputation consolidation. Therefore, today every website seeking to expand its audience is interested in its material promotion within social space, i.e. in the sharing.  Sharpay Company has developed a unique idea in the field of sharing. The developers claim that using the next-generation sharing button called Sharpay, social space users will be able to distribute any favorite information in several social networks in just one click! And the blockchain introduction, creation of internal Sharpay tokens and the possibility of payments with crypto currency make the project truly innovative! Author: @sheriff
Title: ‚ú¥Ô∏è SHARPAY ‚ú¥Ô∏è Share button with blockchain rewards ‚úÖ Buy Now! ‚úÖ
Body: Why is multisharing so relevant today?  Sharing (technology of dissemination of information in social networks) appeared on the market more than 10 years ago. Then there were several independent start-ups that played the role of its popularizers - they made it possible to combine different social networks into a single unit and customize them for the site design.  Today, the buttons of these services are installed only 3-5% of the total number of sites. Over this period of time (more than 10 years), in the operation of the aggregators of sharing, nothing has changed fundamentally - the limited methods of their monetization made the development of this industry meaningless and unattractive for developers.  The multisharing project, developed by Sharpay company, promises to make a real breakthrough in the sharing. The use of blockchain technology in the project will become a powerful impetus for the development of Internet marketing.  Learn more about the project on our website. Ken worked as Director of Cyber Security (CGI Federal office in USA), and Director of Cloud Security. He established CGI Federal Identity Management Practice and Cyber Security Competence Center. While working for CGI as Executive Consultant, Ken consulted the United States Federal Government, financial institutions, and utility companies and provided expertise in Finance, Blockchain, and Cyber Security. He graduated from Zhejian Normal University, Xian Jiaotong University in China and University of Lausanne in Switzerland.  Hurry up to buy Sharpay tokens! ‚úÖ Buy now with 50% bonus!
